metadata.title: 3 PCS Winter Beanie Hat Scarf Gloves Set, Knitted Hat Scarf Touch Screen Gloves for Men Women
features: ★【High-quality Material】Crafted with superior acrylic fibers, skin-friendly, soft and comfortable to wear. Acrylic knit & fleece lining, Made of thicker and cozy acrylic knit, with soft fleecy lining, super comfortable and warm.
★【Lining】 Soft fleece lining, has better heat retention, enjoy the maximum warmth. The thicker fleece lining will effectively keep you warm.
★【Elastic soft material】One size fit most men and women.
★【Delicate Sewing 】Delicate sewing thread, provide the added durability.

★【FEATURES】 3-in-1 winter accessories, you can use this multi-function beanie hat and scarf and gloves set together or separately as you will. It will keep your head, ears, face and neck warm. Stay warm all the time, great for outdoor activities and daily warmer. Touch Screen Gloves also can be used for operating many kinds of touch screen technology Smart products such as cell phone, ipad, TV, Car screen, ATM and so on.
